duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform loan servicing activities such as general loan maintenance, processing loan payments, data entry, loan document creation, lien perfection, escrow/tax support, flood review or general ledger reconciliation.
Understand moderate to complex commercial loan products and documentation, regulation, policy and procedure changes and apply changes to work process.
Capture metrics to assist leadership in coordinating and adjusting workflow.
Participate in continuous improvement efforts to assist in the implementation of workflow improvements.
Provide outstanding customer service; respond to requests and make recommendations to internal and external customers.
Maintain working knowledge of bank regulations and policies regarding Bank Secrecy Act, Regulation CC, Regulation E, Bank Security, and other regulations that apply to the position.
May be asked to coach, mentor, or train others and teach coursework as subject matter expert.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma/GED, Associate's Degree (Bachelor's preferred)
